title: fix: Detect and inject jira ticket placeholder in pr descriptions
body:
- Introduce TICKET_PLACEHOLDER constant and regex detection of Jira-style markers in PR templates
- Post-process AI-generated descriptions to inject the placeholder
- Remove unused jira_project parameter and related substitution logic
- Simplify ticket key helper to swap placeholder with the actual Jira key
- Update CLI to drop jira_project arg and print the generated description
